comment.shortText:
Observe mutations on a DOM node or tree of DOM nodes.
Depends on the `MutationObserver` api.

comment.text: A callback fired when a mutation occurs

mdx.rawBody: A callback fired when a mutation occurs

markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: A callback fired when a mutation occurs
markdownRemark.html: A callback fired when a mutation occurs

Observe mutations on a DOM node or tree of DOM nodes. Depends on the MutationObserver api.

const [element, attachRef] = useCallbackRef(null);

useMutationObserver(element, { subtree: true }, (records) => {

});

return (
  <div ref={attachRef} />
)

comment.shortText:
Observe mutations on a DOM node or tree of DOM nodes.
use a `MutationObserver` and return records as the are received.

markdownRemark.html:
Observe mutations on a DOM node or tree of DOM nodes. use a MutationObserver and return records as the are received.

const [element, attachRef] = useCallbackRef(null);

const records = useMutationObserver(element, { subtree: true });

return (
  <div ref={attachRef} />
)

tags.name: param
tags.value: A callback fired when a mutation occurs
